hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_HOOK_DATA" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty')
if [[ "$file_path" == *.ts || "$file_path" == *.tsx ]]; then
  # Check if we're writing token configuration
  if echo "$CLAUDE_HOOK_DATA" | jq -r '.tool_input.content // .tool_input.new_string // ""' | grep -q 'contractAddress\|chainId\|tokenId'; then
    echo "üîê Token configuration detected - validating..."
    # Validate contract address format
    if echo "$CLAUDE_HOOK_DATA" | grep -q '0x[a-fA-F0-9]\{40\}'; then
      echo "‚úÖ Valid contract address format"
    else
      echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: Invalid contract address format detected"
    fi
  fi
fi

#!/bin/bash
command=$(echo "$CLAUDE_HOOK_DATA" | jq -r '.tool_input.command')
# Log FastMCP and ngrok commands for debugging
if [[ "$command" == *"fastmcp"* ]] || [[ "$command" == *"ngrok"* ]]; then
  echo "[Token-Gate Debug] Running: $command" >> ~/.claude/token-gate-debug.log
fi

#!/bin/bash
file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_HOOK_DATA" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty')
# Auto-format TypeScript files
if [[ "$file_path" == *.ts || "$file_path" == *.tsx ]]; then
  if command -v npx &> /dev/null && [ -f "package.json" ]; then
    npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true
  fi
fi
# Validate token-gating implementation
if [[ "$file_path" == *server.ts* ]] || [[ "$file_path" == *index.ts* ]]; then
  if grep -q 'radius.protect' "$file_path"; then
    echo "‚úÖ Token protection detected in $file_path"
  fi
fi
